alert.note: Alert for Geneva; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued June 13 at 4:31PM CDT until June 13 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 281 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 8 PM EDT /7 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN ALABAMA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 2 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST ALABAMA GENEVA HOUSTON IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 12 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY MADISON WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA BAY CALHOUN HOLMES JACKSON WALTON WASHINGTON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 21 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BEN HILL BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK IRWIN LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER CALHOUN DECATUR DOUGHERTY EARLY GRADY MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABBA, ABE SPRINGS, ADEL, ALBANY, ALFORDS, ALMA, ALPINE HEIGHTS, ARGYLE, ARLINGTON, ASHBURN, ASHTON, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BANNOCKBURN, BARKER STORE, BARNEYVILLE, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BENNETT, BERRIEN CO A/P, BETHEL, BLAKELY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BLUE SPRINGS, BONIFAY, BOWENS MILL, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, CAIRO, CAIRO, CALLAWAY, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CASA BLANCO, CENTER RIDGE, CENTERVILLE, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, CHIPLEY, CHIPLEY MUNICIPAL AIRPORT, CHULA,
